00039         //create SRPP session
00040         int start_SRPP(string address, int port)
00041         {
00042 
00043                 //Create a SRPP Session
00044                 SRPPSession* newsession = new SRPPSession(
00045                                                                         address,port,port);
00046 
00047 
00048                 cout << "Session started at " << newsession->startTime << endl;
00049                 cout << "FOR receiver with IP " << newsession->receiverIP << endl << endl;
00050 
00051                 //Create the socket threads
00052 
00053                 if (address == "receiver")
00054                 {
00055                         ServerSocket* serversock = new ServerSocket(newsession,3530);
00056                         while(true)
00057                         {
00058                                 string data = serversock->getData();
00059                                 //serversock->putData("sending from server");
00060 
00061                                 cout << "-----------------------------------------\n";
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064                 else
00065                 {
00066                         cout << " Trying to contact SQRKal endpoint at " << address << endl;
00067                         ClientSocket* clientsock = new ClientSocket(newsession,address,3530);
00068 
00069                         string data = "";
00070                         while (data.empty()){
00071                                 clientsock->putData("sending from client");
00072                                 //data = clientsock->getData();
00073                         }
00074 
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 cout << "Created the sockets..\n\n";
00078 
00079                 cout << "Session ending now...\n\n";
00080 
00081                 return 0;
00082         }
